Class MarkovMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • markovmachineexecute.MarkovMachine

  • public class MarkovMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Markov machine and can be used to process inputs

    Collin

      • process

        public java.lang.String process(java.lang.String input,
                                boolean debug)
        Applies this Markov machine to the given input until there are no changes.
        Parameters:
        input - input string
        debug - whether or not to debug
        Returns:
        the resulting string is returned.

        public void addState(MarkovRule state)

        Parameters:
